app.name: InnerFriend
app.tagline: Coltiva le tue relazioni pi√π strette
app.description: Uno strumento incentrato sulla privacy per mantenere amicizie significative basato sulla ricerca del numero di Dunbar

landing.heroDescription: Secondo la ricerca di Dunbar, possiamo davvero mantenere solo circa 5 amicizie intime, 15 amici stretti e 150 connessioni significative. Inner Friend ti aiuta a coltivare intenzionalmente le relazioni che contano di pi√π.

intentionalLimits.title: Limiti Intenzionali
intentionalLimits.description: La scienza dimostra che abbiamo limiti naturali per le relazioni significative. Accettali per concentrarti su chi conta davvero.

privateByDefault.title: Privato di Default
privateByDefault.description: Le tue liste rimangono sul tuo dispositivo. Crea un account solo se desideri persistenza e abbinamento reciproco opzionale.

mutualDiscovery.title: Scoperta Reciproca
mutualDiscovery.description: Scopri opzionalmente quando qualcuno che hai elencato come stretto ti ha anche elencato ‚Äî una dolce celebrazione della reciprocit√†.

dataLiberation.title: Your Data, Your Way
dataLiberation.description: Export all your data anytime. GDPR compliant with full consent management, account deletion, and data portability.

nayborNetwork.title: Naybor Network
nayborNetwork.description: Build community resilience with trusted neighbors. Quick SOS access, shared emergency contacts, and mutual aid.

globalReach.title: 23 Languages
globalReach.description: Full internationalization with RTL support for Arabic, Urdu, and Hebrew. Available in your native language.

mission.title: Tempo Reale, Non Pubblicit√†
mission.description: Vinciamo quando lasci il nostro sito ‚Äî per condividere momenti reali con le persone che contano di pi√π. Quando la distanza vi separa, ti aiuteremo ad avviare videochiamate. Ma niente batte esserci di persona.
mission.inspiration: La nostra ispirazione: Dentyne Ice "Crea Tempo Reale"

landing.quote: "Non tutte le relazioni sono simmetriche ‚Äî e questo √® perfettamente naturale. L'obiettivo non √® l'equilibrio perfetto, ma la presenza intenzionale."

Future modifications may include rules where certain tier counts affect others ‚Äî for example, parasocial connections might reduce your allowable outer friend capacity.

mission.title: Face Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site ‚Äî to share real moments with the people who matter most.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration? This classic Dentyne Ice commercial ‚Äî the perfect reminder that the best moments happen when you put down the phone and show up:
mission.quote: "Make Face Time" ‚Äî that's the ideal. When distance separates you, we'll help you bridge it with video kalls. But always remember: nothing beats being there.

keysShared.title: Chiavi Condivise

address.title: Il Tuo Indirizzo
address.description: Conferma il tuo indirizzo di casa per i soccorritori

keysShared.addressHelp: This address will be shared with emergency responders when your naybors request help on your behalf.
keysShared.instructionsPlaceholder: Keypad is to the right of door, ring twice...
keysShared.instructionsHint: Include any details responders should know about accessing your home
keysShared.notesPlaceholder: Key is under the blue flowerpot...
keysShared.selectNaybors: Add a naybor who has access:
keysShared.noNaybors: Add naybors first to share keys with them
keysShared.allNayborsAssigned: All your naybors have been assigned
keysShared.mandatoryScenariosHelp: These life-threatening or safety-critical scenarios always allow entry. They cannot be disabled because they protect life, limb, and innocent humans from trauma.
keysShared.optionalScenariosHelp: You can choose whether naybors can enter for these scenarios.

cardiac_arrest.name: Cardiac Arrest
cardiac_arrest.description: Heart attack or sudden cardiac arrest ‚Äî every second counts

choking.name: Choking
choking.description: Choking emergency ‚Äî airway blocked, needs immediate help

drowning.name: Drowning
drowning.description: Drowning in pool, bathtub, or other water

anaphylaxis.name: Anaphylactic Shock
anaphylaxis.description: Severe allergic reaction from bee sting, food, medication

elderly_fall.name: Elderly Fall
elderly_fall.description: Elderly person fallen, unable to get up, possibly injured

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: Fire detected ‚Äî threat to life, limb, tissue, anyone immobilized or asleep

carbon_monoxide.name: Carbon Monoxide
carbon_monoxide.description: CO detector alarm ‚Äî silent killer, occupants may be unconscious

childhood_corporal.name: Childhood Corporal Punishment
childhood_corporal.description: Child alerting naybors to corporal punishment. Research shows community intervention prevents future violence.

take10_spiral.name: Take 10 Shouting Spiral
take10_spiral.description: Domestic shouting escalating unacceptably. De-escalation intervention needed.

bedroom_consent.name: Bedroom Consent Conflict
bedroom_consent.description: Detected bedroom consent conflict emergency ‚Äî immediate intervention required

medical_other.name: Other Medical Emergency
medical_other.description: Other medical emergency requiring home entry

intruder_check.name: Intruder Check
intruder_check.description: Check on suspected intruder when you cannot respond

welfare_check.name: Welfare Check
welfare_check.description: General welfare check when you are unresponsive for extended period

flooding.name: Flooding/Water Leak
flooding.description: Water leak or flooding ‚Äî property damage prevention (not life-threatening)

keysShared.reviewWarning: By saving these settings, you authorize your designated naybors to enter your home during the selected emergency scenarios. Make sure you trust these people with access to your home.

emergencyWorkerSharing.title: Accesso Soccorritori
emergencyWorkerSharing.enabled: Condividi con i Servizi di Emergenza
emergencyWorkerSharing.enabledDescription: Le centrali operative verificate (ambulanza, vigili del fuoco, polizia) possono richiedere il tuo Albero delle Chiavi della Porta durante le emergenze al tuo indirizzo.
emergencyWorkerSharing.disabledDescription: I servizi di emergenza NON avranno accesso ai tuoi contatti chiavi dei vicini. Solo i tuoi vicini designati possono usare queste informazioni.
emergencyWorkerSharing.warning: Disabilitare questo potrebbe ritardare la risposta di emergenza se i soccorritori devono sfondare la porta invece di usare le chiavi dei vicini.
emergencyWorkerSharing.reviewEnabled: La centrale operativa pu√≤ accedere al tuo Albero delle Chiavi della Porta

doorBreaking.title: Preferenza Sfondamento Porta
doorBreaking.description: Se i soccorritori non riescono a raggiungere un detentore di chiavi, come devono procedere?

break_fast_no_naybors.name: Sfonda Veloce, Salta i Vicini
break_fast_no_naybors.description: In emergenza, sfondare la porta immediatamente. Non perdere tempo a contattare i vicini per le chiavi.

break_fast_call_naybors.name: Sfonda Veloce, Chiama i Vicini
break_fast_call_naybors.description: Contattare i vicini per le chiavi, ma non esitare a sfondare la porta se necessario. La velocit√† √® prioritaria.

last_resort_only.name: Solo Ultima Risorsa
last_resort_only.description: Per favore sfondare la porta solo dopo attenta considerazione, come ultima risorsa quando strettamente necessario legalmente.

settings.deleteAccountDescription: Elimina permanentemente il tuo account e tutti i dati associati

naybor.underMinDescription: Avere vicini fidati nelle vicinanze √® essenziale per le emergenze, l'aiuto reciproco e la costruzione della resilienza della comunit√†. Presentati ai tuoi vicini!

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. Essential cookies are required for the app to work.
cookies.settingsDescription: Choose which types of cookies you want to allow. Essential cookies are always enabled as they are required for the site to function.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic site functionality like authentication and security.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences like language settings and UI customizations.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site to improve the experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.

deletion.title: Delete Your Account

deletedItems.connections: All your friend connections and circles
